Articles.Content:
Hope this is just me...

On MAC, safari...

When I open the website, the main pic of the famous three show them with green teeth. Like they have only gums.

During a mission I can see white dental features.

Just looking at the website picture yields a feeling of incompleteness. I assume this is an oversight - but can be quickly fixed.

Cheers,

W.
They look like a fairly neutral greyish shade from here. Are your monitor's color temperature and brightness/contrast settings set correctly?

Like they have only gums.

Actually, Kerbal gums and mouths (and presumably blood) are red, not green.

Hope this is just me...

It's just you.

Figured it out.

It is an optical illusion. When I enlarge the image, the teeth show a different and more normal tint. Normal sized (albeit on a 27" thunderbolt display) the pixels run together so my brain fails to pickup the subtle difference.

You may now return to you regularly scheduled whatever...
